Reidemeister 2 Move¶

Example Test Function¶
 1def test_r2_unknot_over_loop(unknot_over_loop, poly_unknot):
 2
 3    sgd = unknot_over_loop()
 4
 5    assert sgd.yamada_polynomial() == poly_unknot
 6
 7    r2_crossing_labels = available_r2_moves(sgd)
 8
 9    assert len(r2_crossing_labels) == 1
10    assert ('c1', 'c2') in r2_crossing_labels or ('c2', 'c1') in r2_crossing_labels
11
12    sgd = apply_r2_move(sgd, ('c1', 'c2'))
13
14    assert sgd.yamada_polynomial() == poly_unknot
15
16
17def test_r2_unknot_two_over_loops(unknot_two_over_loops, poly_unknot):
18
19    # Initialize the spatial graph diagram
20    sgd = unknot_two_over_loops()
21
22    # Sanity check the initial state
23    assert len(sgd.edges) == 8
24    assert len(sgd.vertices) == 0
25    assert len(sgd.crossings) == 4
26    assert sgd.yamada_polynomial() == poly_unknot
27
28    # Remove the first loop
29    r2_moves = available_r2_moves(sgd)
Example Test Function¶
 1    assert len(r2_moves) == 3
 2
 3    # Faces are not ordered, so we need to check both directions
 4    assert ('c1', 'c2') in r2_moves or ('c2', 'c1') in r2_moves
 5    assert ('c3', 'c4') in r2_moves or ('c4', 'c3') in r2_moves
 6    assert ('c2', 'c3') in r2_moves or ('c3', 'c2') in r2_moves
 7
 8    sgd = apply_r2_move(sgd, ('c1', 'c2'), simplify=False)
 9
10    # Disable "simplify" to ensure that "apply_r2_move" removes the crossings in a diagrammatically correct way.
11    # It should delete two crossings and connect the opposite edges with 2-valent vertices.
12    assert len(sgd.edges) == 8
13    assert len(sgd.vertices) == 4
14    assert len(sgd.crossings) == 2
15    assert sgd.yamada_polynomial() == poly_unknot
16
17    # Now simplify the diagram
18    sgd.simplify_diagram()
19    assert len(sgd.edges) == 4
20    assert len(sgd.vertices) == 0
21    assert len(sgd.crossings) == 2
22    assert sgd.yamada_polynomial() == poly_unknot
23
24    # Remove the second loop
25    r2_moves = available_r2_moves(sgd)
26
27    assert len(r2_moves) == 1
28    assert ('c3', 'c4') in r2_moves or ('c4', 'c3') in r2_moves
29
30    sgd = apply_r2_move(sgd, ('c3', 'c4'), simplify=False)
31    assert len(sgd.edges) == 4
32    assert len(sgd.vertices) == 4
33    assert len(sgd.crossings) == 0
34    assert sgd.yamada_polynomial() == poly_unknot
35
36    sgd.simplify_diagram()
37    assert len(sgd.edges) == 1
38    assert len(sgd.vertices) == 1
39    assert len(sgd.crossings) == 0
40    assert sgd.yamada_polynomial() == poly_unknot
41
42    # Verify that there are no more R2 moves
43    r2_moves = available_r2_moves(sgd)
44    assert len(r2_moves) == 0
45
46
47def test_r2_unknot_one_over_one_under_loop(unknot_one_over_one_under_loop, poly_unknot):
48
49    sgd = unknot_one_over_one_under_loop()
50
51    # Remove the first loop
52
53    r2_crossing_labels = available_r2_moves(sgd)
54
55    assert len(r2_crossing_labels) == 2
56    assert ('c1', 'c2') in r2_crossing_labels or ('c2', 'c1') in r2_crossing_labels
57
58    sgd = apply_r2_move(sgd, ('c1', 'c2'))
59
60    yp_after_first_r2 = sgd.yamada_polynomial()
61
62    assert yp_after_first_r2 == poly_unknot
63
64    # Remove the second loop
65
66    r2_crossing_labels = available_r2_moves(sgd)
67
68    assert len(r2_crossing_labels) == 1
69    assert ('c3', 'c4') in r2_crossing_labels or ('c4', 'c3') in r2_crossing_labels
70
71    sgd = apply_r2_move(sgd, ('c3', 'c4'))
72
Example Test Function¶
1    assert yp_after_second_r2 == poly_unknot
2
3    r2_crossing_labels = available_r2_moves(sgd)
4
5    assert len(r2_crossing_labels) == 0
